subject: all new databases for the medical profession
body:
Medical Profession Databases
Below offers good until June 8, 2007

Directory 1:	780,000 Physicians in the USA
		Arranged by State
		Sortable by more than a dozen different fields
		including specialty
		Price= $299 

Directory 2:	17,400 Physician Email Addresses
		Arranged by State
		Contains first & last name, email, postal address and
		specialty
		Price= $199

Directory 3:	23,000 Hospital Administrators
		Featuring full data on CEO,CFO,CIO,COO,
		Medical Directors,Nursing Directors,Senior Administrator
		Price= $199 

Directory 4:	597k Dentist Directory
		Sortable Fields: Dentist/Clinic Name, Postal Address, Phone, Fax, Email, Website
		Price= $199 

Directory 5:	143,000 American Pharmacies
		Sortable Fields: Business Name, Postal Address, Phone, Fax, Email, Website
		Price= $199

Directory 6:	125,460 Physical Therapist/Occupational Therapist Directory
		Sortable Fields: Clinic/Therapist Name, Postal Address, Phone, Fax, Email, Website
		Price= $199

Take all 6 directories for only $599 - smaller package deals also available

For additional info or to order send an email to: medical.data@hotmail.com 
  or call (206) 984-0935 












reply with "scratch" in the subject heading to end future messages from us.
